attributes.action: Copyright law should not allow energy inventions of human benefit to be shelved by corporations
attributes.additional_details: As guardians of the public interest, the below signatories believe that the current copyright and patent laws are flawed to allow corporations to shelve inventions of public, planet Eco, energy generation and universal benefit. We wish for current legislation to be reviewed to allow anyone access to and right to manufacture such inventions with a nominal fee paid to the patent holder of £0.01 per unit manufactured.
